𒋀 ≈ 𒌶 ≈ 𒅅 ≈ 𓌢 in hieratic 𒋀 ŠEŠ 𓌢 শিশু śiśu 𒋀𒋰 “sister” Geschwist 𒋀 šeš assistant

𒋀 ≈ 𒌶 ≈ 𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖 sas "grass, turf"

𒋀 ŠEŠ salz(ig) 𒋀 maru 𒈥𒊒 mar-ruⁿ 𒋀 mun₄ 𒁵 mun 𒋀 ŠEŠ ащы aşşy salty ачуу açuu acid 쓰다 sseuda "bitter, brackish" salebra

𒋀𒋢 sas-su Schüssel

𒌶𒆠 City of Ur 𒌶𒆠 URI5KI, 𒋀𒀕𒆠 URIM2KI or 𒋀𒀊𒆠 URIM5KI Akkadian: 𒋀𒀕𒆠

𒌶 URIN URIM “standard” ⇔ Stand 𒈹 ≈ 𓊾 ≈ 𒋀

𒋀 ÙRI ŠEŠ “sister”

⇔ 𒂞 EREN 𒋁 ŠEŠ2 Susa / Elam

𒋀 šeš 𓌢𓏏 sister ᛊᚹᛖᛊᛏᚨᚱ

𒋀 marru 𓈗 brackish, bitter ⋍ brother
𒋀 aḫu Achim : brother
𒋀𒈨𒌍 Achimen : brothers
𒁹𒀭𒂗𒍪𒋀𒈨𒌍𒌷𒁀 Sîn-ahhī-erība Sin replaced brothers : King Sennacherib

𒋀 mar™

𒋀 marru "bitter" ⇔ beti ?
𒈥𒋾𒂊𒈪 mar-ti e-mi sister-in-law
𒈥𒊒 mar-ru مر murr מַר mar mõru amar amārus መራራ märara ܡܪܝܪܐ marrīrā 𒋀 marru 𐎎𐎗 mr /mar/ "bitter" 𓈗
